title: The Arcane Side of Life
description: SUMMARY: A high elf’s relationship with a human girl is put to the test as they combat a dark elf’s assembly of an undead army.SYNOPSIS: Anya and Ithilnin (Nin) adjust to the new changes and challenges in their personal circumstances. They blame and turn on each other when the unthinkable happens to their newborn child.Meanwhile, the dark elves experiment with infusing unique immortal souls into human cloned bodies, as Laer secretly works on building an indestructible undead army to enforce his new world order. The final battle takes place within the virtual world of the elven underground, where the combined forces of magic and technology reign supreme.Love and sacrifice, passion and purpose, a high elf’s demand, a dark elf’s desire—will the freedom fighters triumph or be forever enslaved?The Arcane Side of Life marks the epic final chapter in The (Cyberpunk) Elven Trilogy.GENRE: Urban Fantasy / Cyberpunk / YA with adult crossover appeal
author: Jess C. Scott
